params.data: Calldata of the call made to target
params.useEth: Specifies if Eth is being sent to the target

returns.isValid: canCall Specifies if the interaction is accepted
returns.tokensIn: List of tokens that the account will receive after the interactions
returns.tokensOut: List of tokens that will be removed from the account after the interaction

controllerFor(address).notice: Mapping of external interaction with respective controller
